episode: I just dropped my cat off at the vet for some work today and she was very scared and I feel absolutely guilty and awful.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I just dropped my cat off at the vet for some work today and she was very scared and it was hard leaving her.  I feel extremely guilty!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It can be tough leaving a pet behind, especially when they're scared.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yeah I know she will be ok and that she is in good hands but I still feel very bad about it.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's natural to worry about their well-being, even if you know they're in good care.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Yes I feel bad because she just had to go to the vet a few days ago and now she is getting dental work.  She hates the vet and yowls the entire trip there and back.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Poor thing! It sounds like she's had a rough week, and that's hard on you too.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It really has been!  I felt so bad so I stopped at Starbucks on my way to work and got something to drink to make me feel a little better.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: A little pick-me-up can help take the edge off, right?

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: It definitely helped.  I still cannot stop feeling bad though.  I hope things are ok and she is fine.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: It's hard to shake off the worry. Hopefully the vet will call soon with a good update.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I sure hope so!  My pets are like family so I consider it the same as if another family member were at the hospital or at the doctor.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: They're part of the family, and it's natural to feel that way.

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I'm glad you agree!  I will have to get her some treats when I get her back  home.  She definitely deserves something.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: She'll appreciate the extra love and treats after a tough day at the vet!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: I agree.  She tends not to be too upset with me after events like today.  She seems to get over things somewhat quickly.

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: That's great, she's a resilient kitty!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: She really is.  They had to remove one tooth last year I'm hoping they don

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: Fingers crossed it's just a routine cleaning and no more extractions!

dialogue.speaker: Human
dialogue.message: Hoping they don't have to extract one this time.  Definitely!  Thank you for the kind words!

dialogue.speaker: Bot
dialogue.message: You're welcome, sending you and your kitty positive vibes!
